trans-unit.source: Represents a code checksum pragma code entity.
trans-unit.target: 表示代码校验和杂注代码实体。

trans-unit.source: The CodeChecksumPragma class inherits from <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeDirective> and can be contained in a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeDirectiveCollection>.
trans-unit.target: CodeChecksumPragma 类继承<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeDirective>，并且可以包含在一种<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeDirectiveCollection>。</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeDirectiveCollection> </xref:System.CodeDom.CodeDirective>

trans-unit.source: CodeChecksumPragma provides the unique identification of source files, including files that have been generated.
trans-unit.target: CodeChecksumPragma 提供源文件，包括已生成的文件的唯一标识。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeChecksumPragma"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeChecksumPragma"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeChecksumPragma"></xref> class using a file name, a GUID representing the checksum algorithm, and a byte stream representing the checksum data.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeChecksumPragma"></xref>使用文件的类名称，表示校验和算法，并表示校验和数据的字节流的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the `checksumAlgorithmId` parameter, see the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeChecksumPragma.ChecksumAlgorithmId%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息`checksumAlgorithmId`参数，请参阅<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeChecksumPragma.ChecksumAlgorithmId%2A>属性。</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeChecksumPragma.ChecksumAlgorithmId%2A>

trans-unit.source: The path to the checksum file.
trans-unit.target: 校验和文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Guid> that identifies the checksum algorithm to use.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Guid>，它标识要使用的校验和算法。</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: A byte array that contains the checksum data.
trans-unit.target: 包含的校验和数据的字节数组。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a GUID that identifies the checksum algorithm to use.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个 GUID，标识要使用的校验和算法。

trans-unit.source: Algorithms are provided for the MD5 and SHA1 hashes.
trans-unit.target: 提供 MD5 和 SHA1 哈希算法。

trans-unit.source: The GUID value to use for the MD5 hash is {0x406ea660, 0x64cf, 0x4c82, 0xb6, 0xf0, 0x42, 0xd4, 0x81, 0x72, 0xa7, 0x99}.
trans-unit.target: 要用于的 MD5 哈希的 GUID 值是 {0x406ea660、 0x64cf、 0x4c82、 0xb6，0xf0、 0x42，0xd4、 0x81，0x72、 0xa7，0x99}。

trans-unit.source: The GUID to use for the SHA1 hash is {0xff1816ec, 0xaa5e, 0x4d10, 0x87, 0xf7, 0x6f, 0x49, 0x63, 0x83, 0x34, 0x60}.
trans-unit.target: 要用于的 SHA1 哈希的 GUID 是 {0xff1816ec、 0xaa5e、 0x4d10、 0x87 0xf7、 0x6f，0x49、 0x63，0x83、 0x34，0x60}。

trans-unit.source: The calculation of the checksum is language-specific.
trans-unit.target: 校验和的计算是特定于语言的。

trans-unit.source: That is, the language vendor can use any of the hashing algorithms known to the debugger to calculate the checksum.
trans-unit.target: 即的语言供应商可以使用任一调试器已知的哈希算法计算校验和。

trans-unit.source: The use of a GUID for this property provides hash algorithm extensibility.
trans-unit.target: 此属性使用 GUID 提供哈希算法可扩展性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Guid> that identifies the checksum algorithm to use.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Guid>，它标识要使用的校验和算法。</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the data for the checksum calculation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置校验和计算的数据的值。

trans-unit.source: The ChecksumData property contains data from the target file specified by the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeChecksumPragma.FileName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ChecksumData 属性包含从指定的目标文件的数据<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeChecksumPragma.FileName%2A>属性。</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeChecksumPragma.FileName%2A>

trans-unit.source: A byte array that contains the data for the checksum calculation.
trans-unit.target: 包含校验和计算的数据的字节数组。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path to the checksum file.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置校验和文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: An example of a FileName property value is "C:\Temp\Test\OuterLinePragma.txt".
trans-unit.target: FileName 属性值的一个示例是"C:\Temp\Test\OuterLinePragma.txt"。

trans-unit.source: The path to the checksum file.
trans-unit.target: 校验和文件的路径。
